bundle_ingredients.Daffodil: Spring Foraging, buy from Pierre at Flower Dance

bundle_ingredients.Dandelion: Spring Foraging, buy from Pierre at Flower Dance

bundle_ingredients.Spice Berry: Summer Foraging, The Farm Cave (fruit bat option)

bundle_ingredients.Common Mushroom: Fall Foraging, Spring & Fall Foraging in the Secret Woods, The Farm Cave (mushroom option), Tapping a Mushroom Tree

bundle_ingredients.Wild Plum: Fall Foraging, The Farm Cave (fruit bat option)

bundle_ingredients.Blackberry: Fall Foraging, The Farm Cave (fruit bat option)

bundle_ingredients.Winter Root: Tilling soil or Artifact Spots in Winter, dropped by Blue Slimes on levels 41-79 of The Mines

bundle_ingredients.Crystal Fruit: Winter Foraging, dropped by Dust Sprites on levels 41-79 of The Mines

bundle_ingredients.Snow Yam: Tilling soil or Artifact Spots in Winter

bundle_ingredients.Wood (99): Chopping Trees or branches with an Axe
Chopping Trees or branches with an Axe

bundle_ingredients.Hardwood (10): Chopping Large Stumps or Large Logs with an upgraded Axe, smashing crates in The Mines

bundle_ingredients.Cave Carrot: The Mines, either smashing boxes or tilling soil

bundle_ingredients.Red Mushroom: Foraging in The Mines, Summer or Fall Foraging in the Secret Woods, The Farm Cave (mushroom option), Tapping a Mushroom Tree, Forest Farm Map in Fall.

bundle_ingredients.Purple Mushroom: The Mines, The Farm Cave (mushroom option), Forest Farm Map Foraging in Fall

bundle_ingredients.Morel: Foraging in the Secret Woods or Forest Farm Map in Spring, The Farm Cave (mushroom option)

bundle_ingredients.Truffle Oil (1): Made from Truffles using an Oil Maker

bundle_ingredients.Apple: Apple Trees during Fall, The Farm Cave (fruit bat option)

bundle_ingredients.Apricot: Apricot Trees during Spring, The Farm Cave (fruit bat option)

bundle_ingredients.Orange: Orange Trees during Summer, The Farm Cave (fruit bat option)

bundle_ingredients.Peach: Peach Trees during Summer, The Farm Cave (fruit bat option)

bundle_ingredients.Pomegranate: Pomegranate Trees during Fall, The Farm Cave (fruit bat option)

bundle_ingredients.Cherry: Cherry Trees during Spring, The Farm Cave (fruit bat option)

bundle_ingredients.Sunfish:
Found in Rivers, 6am – 7pm, Spring, and Summer during sunny weather. 
Found in the Riverlands Farm or in the Wilderness Farm pond during rainy weather.

bundle_ingredients.Catfish: Found in Rivers and Secret Woods Pond Anytime, Spring and Fall. Only when raining.

bundle_ingredients.Shad: Found in Rivers, 9am – 2am, Spring, Summer, and Fall. Only when raining.

bundle_ingredients.Tiger Trout: Found in Rivers, 6am – 7pm, Fall and Winter.

bundle_ingredients.Largemouth Bass: Found in the Mountain lake, 6am – 7pm, All Seasons.

bundle_ingredients.Carp:
Found in the Mountain lake, Anytime, All Seasons.
Found in Cindersap Forest pond, Anytime, Spring, Summer, or Fall.
Found in Secret Woods or Sewer, Anytime, All Seasons.

bundle_ingredients.Bullhead: Found in the Mountain Lake, Anytime, All Seasons.

bundle_ingredients.Sturgeon: Found in the Mountain Lake, 6am – 7pm, Summer and Winter.

bundle_ingredients.Sardine: Found in the Ocean, 6am – 7pm, Spring, Fall, and Winter.

bundle_ingredients.Tuna: Found in the Ocean, 6am – 7pm, Summer and Winter.

bundle_ingredients.Red Snapper: Found in the Ocean, 6am – 7pm, Summer and Fall. Only when raining.

bundle_ingredients.Tilapia: Found in the Ocean, 6am – 2pm, Summer and Fall.

bundle_ingredients.Walleye: Found in Rivers, Lakes and Forest Pond, 12pm – 2am, Fall. Only when raining.

bundle_ingredients.Eel: Found in the Ocean, 4pm – 2am, Spring or Fall. Only when raining.

bundle_ingredients.Crab: Caught in Crab Pots, drops from Rock Crabs or Lava Crabs in The Mines

bundle_ingredients.Cockle: Caught in Crab Pots, Beach Foraging

bundle_ingredients.Mussel: Caught in Crab Pots, Beach Foraging

bundle_ingredients.Oyster: Caught in Crab Pots, Beach Foraging

bundle_ingredients.Clam: Caught in Crab Pots, Beach Foraging

bundle_ingredients.Pufferfish: Found in the Ocean, 12pm – 4pm, Summer during sunny weather.

bundle_ingredients.Ghostfish: Found in ponds in The Mines levels 20 and 60, Anytime, All Seasons. May also be dropped by Ghosts.

bundle_ingredients.Sandfish: Found in the pond in The Desert, 6am – 8pm, All Seasons.

bundle_ingredients.Woodskip: Found in the Secret Woods, Anytime, All Seasons.

bundle_ingredients.Copper Bar: Smelting Copper Ore in the Furnace

bundle_ingredients.Iron Bar: Smelting Iron Ore in the Furnace, Crafting the "Transmute (Fe)" recipe

bundle_ingredients.Gold Bar: Smelting Gold Ore in the Furnace, Crafting the "Transmute (Au)" recipe

bundle_ingredients.Quartz: Foraging on all levels of The Mines

bundle_ingredients.Earth Crystal: Foraging on Levels 1-39 of The Mines, Geodes, Omni Geodes, drop from Duggies in the Mines (floors 1-29)

bundle_ingredients.Frozen Tear: Foraging on Levels 40-79 of The Mines, Frozen Geodes, Omni Geodes, drop from Dust Sprites in the Mines (floors 40-80)

bundle_ingredients.Fire Quartz: Foraging on Levels 80-120 of The Mines, Magma Geodes, Omni Geodes

bundle_ingredients.Bat Wing (10): Dropped by Bats in The Mines

bundle_ingredients.Solar Essence: Dropped by Ghosts, Squid Kids, or Metal Heads in The Mines, dropped by Mummies in the Skull Cavern

bundle_ingredients.Void Essence: Dropped by Shadow Brutes in The Mines or Serpents in the Skull Cavern

bundle_ingredients.Fiddlehead Fern: Summer Foraging in the Secret Woods

bundle_ingredients.Maki Roll: Cooking (recipe sources: The Queen of Sauce, The Saloon)

bundle_ingredients.Red Mushroom: Foraging in The Mines, Summer or Fall Foraging in the Secret Woods, The Farm Cave (mushroom option), Tapping a Mushroom Tree

bundle_ingredients.Sea Urchin: Beach Foraging, after using 300 wood to fix the bridge to the right side of the beach

bundle_ingredients.Aquamarine: Aquamarine Nodes, boxes in The Mines, Fishing Treasure Chests

bundle_ingredients.Red Cabbage: Summer Crops (Red Cabbage Seeds are available at Pierre's General Store in year 2+)

bundle_ingredients.Purple Mushroom: The Mines, The Farm Cave (mushroom option), Forest Farm Map Foraging in Fall

bundle_ingredients.Nautilus Shell: Winter Beach Foraging (Note: NOT the Nautilus Fossil artifact)

bundle_ingredients.Chub: Can be found in the mountain lake and river during all seasons, any time.

bundle_ingredients.Hay (10): Purchase at Marnie's Ranch, or harvest grass with the Scythe once you have a Silo, and withdraw the hay from the Hay Hopperonce you have a Coop or Barn

bundle_ingredients.Apple (3): Apple Trees during Fall, The Farm Cave (fruit bat option)

bundle_ingredients.Rabbit's Foot: Rabbits, Serpent drop in Skull Cavern (0.8%)

bundle_ingredients.Pomegranate: Pomegranate Trees during Fall, The Farm Cave (fruit bat option)
